data.name: With Good Intentions
data.detailed_description:
"With Good Intentions" is a visual novella about time and atonement telling a story of two heroes.

The new project from Brezg Studio offers vivid memorable characters, intricate non-linear story with two parallel universes, and multiple endings.

The player can choose a path the heroes will follow.

Captain Paul Lange is trying to find a way out from the Infamous abbey of Shemergard. But soon he realises that he is connected with this place. Paul is getting visions in which he relives episodes from the life of Rayon von Eigo, a great knight of the past who defended the monastery from heathens hundreds of years ago.

Find out why the master died and resurrected over and over. Walk this path together with him and Paul. Survive in the endless abbey corridors and defeat the monsters who live there. Reveal the secret of the immortal ruler of Shemergard.

The Imperial Army has suffered a major defeat. The rebels were pursuing the survivors, and Captain Paul Lange decided to hide his squadron at a desolate abbey that grew looming in their way. The gate grates pulled up by themselves...

"Look, something is wrong here…"
What is it?"
"The silence." No sound of cattle or birds – what kind of a monastery is that? And no sound of people.  

After a wistful shiver, Richard added:

"This doesn't bode well."



Die. Rise. Find a way out.

The main heroes will have to endure whatever trials they encounter within the walls of Shemergard. But if Paul facing death has no room for mistake, fate treated Rayon much more favourably.

The Master is destined to partake in the key events of this ill-fated siege of the abbey over and over again: to seek the missing information, walk off established paths to find new ones...

And die.

But death is followed by an awakening and another chance. Rayon remembers every defeat and uses this knowledge to win.

Killed by a murderer's knife? Take a company of loyal knights! And hope that heathens will not venture into the monastery while they are away.



The finest of knights

See the sombre splendor of Shemergard and its everpresent tenants in all the glory!

The highly detailed characters will play their drama backed by colourful decorations and original visual effects.

Time and dark magic have taken its toll on the abbey's walls, and the heroes will see the difference with their on eyes.



The bond of times have broken

The story of the visual novella is taking place in two epochs. It could seem that they are connected only in the main character's visions. But every step inside the infamous abbey will bring the player closer to revealing of the Shemergard's secret which is hidden in both worlds.



Rules of the Genre

From horror and thriller to epic adventures and detective - "With Good Intentions" goes beyond the standard storyline limits. The story told in different genres proves to be interesting and intriguing.

Love flourishes at the battle field

The heroes are surrounded by their compadres ready to provide their support in the most difficult situations. Where will their adventures lead to: to enmity, friendship or something bigger?

data.short_description: The Age of Blade and the Age of Gun entwined. The master of the knights and the imperial captain are separated by centuries, but bound by memory. Solve the mysteries of the cursed abbey and its immortal lord. Rejoin the link of time. Find out where the road will take thee with good intentions.

content_descriptors.notes: Violent battle scenes, wanton violence, injuring, blood, dismembering, mental violence, corpses, sex scenes, covered nudity.
